code: import axios from"axios";export default{getRandomUsers:function getRandomUsers(){return axios.get("https://randomuser.me/api/?results=300").then(function(res){var users=res.data.results;return users.map(function(user){return{title:user.name.title,firstName:user.name.first,lastName:user.name.last,email:user.email,phone:user.phone,location:user.location.city,photo:user.picture.large};});});}};
